channel.title: Dominic Cummings on 0x000216
channel.description: Recent content in Dominic Cummings on 0x000216

item.title: I did not make any promises of a rose garden to you: a rebuttal to Dominic Cummings
item.description: Professor Steve Peers, University of Essex Dominic Cummings recently criticized me and others on Twitter, calling us “charlatan campaigning lawyers” who are “really bad at politics.” He based this on a tweet by David Allen Green about the potential reversal of Brexit and a baseless claim that we believed Dominic Grieve could defeat the Vote Leave campaign in 2019. Cummings’ critique of my political skills is irrelevant, as I am a law professor, not a politician or political strategist.
